content.detailedDescription:
Once again strange lights are appearing in the sky around land o lakes, fl (pasco county).  lots of streaking lights like falling stars except they streak across the sky rather than falling, sorta like climbing in altitude.  (?)  then around 2am friday morning oct. 29 i saw a "star" very, very high up sail across the length of the sky until it disappeared.  and then saturday 6:15pm (+/-15 min.) a fireball sailed across the eastern sky moving north.

things of this nature have occurred off and on since i moved here in jan. of 2008.  in the beginning i reported but haven't done so in a long time.  but i hope that maybe others in the area might read this and post their sightings in this area too.
content.summary: Lights and fire balls land o lakes, fl

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving south on the us-101 highway saturday afternoon on my way home from work in woodland hills, california. i was telling my friend [first name removed cms/dr] about a telephone conversation i had the night before, and at that moment, ahead of me in the sky was a huge object, about the size of a blimp in the distance moving slowly across the sky.  i have lived in california my whole life, and i am very familiar with what a blimp looks like as the good year blimp is stationed in orange county, so i immediately ruled it out as it was a lot thinner, and was moving quicker than a blimp normally does, and there was no cockpit underneath it.  it was moving from the southeast to the northwest, near the san bernardino mountains.  judging by my location, it seemed to be moving over glendale, or even maybe claremont.  from my vantage point it didn't appear to have any visible seams , but it did appear to have a slight shiny appearance, almost like hematite.  i said to my friend oh my god look at that and he said what and i said i think i see a a ufo and as he was driving he was not able to see exactly what it was that i was seeing, but as i said before i knew for a fact that it was not a blimp.  i used to live in camarillo, california,  directly under the flight path of  point mugu naval base and the camarillo airport,  so i am pretty experienced at identifying many different types of aircraft it moved steadily to the north, then disappeared behind the mountains.  i made the comment to him that since it was visible in broad daylight, i am not the only one who must have seen this.  i came to this site to see if anyone else had reported it, and am surprised that i am the first one.  i urge anyone else who is doing the same thing to report this.  i have seen other unidentified objects in the night sky, but never in the daytime.
content.summary: Blimp-like, but not as wide, so more like a cigar with rounded ends

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out to call my cat in at about 9:20 pm. the night was crystal clear and very cold. january 30th, 2009. something caught my peripheral sight line and i couldn't believe what i saw. it was a huge vee shaped object that sat as if painted on the night sky. it was motionless and had no sound. the wing span on each side had to be 60 - 100 feet or so. each wing had four, round white lights. the craft stayed in that same position for at least fifteen minutes. i had enough time to call my neighbor to see it and my daughter as well. (my daughter reports that she remembers the craft changing shape, into a long line from the vee. suddenly, a small red light at the apex of the vee came on and the craft disappeared. again, it disappeared without any sound or visual trail. a similar event took place in april of that same year. i saw a white light coming across the top of the mountains and for some reason i just knew it was the same craft returning. i ran outside, called my husband to come and look and this time saw a smaller craft with only two lights on each wing, again, white round lights. the craft stayed a shorter time and more or less disappeared in the same way...Instantaneously.
i would be happy to discuss this with you.In retrospect, i remember feeling  puzzled at the sight, then excited and then somewhat fearful.
content.summary: Saw huge vee shape, with four large round lights on each wing. motionless, no sound, close by hanging in sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out back window, i saw a large object go over our house, no noise, i yelled for my husband to go to the front of the house. i was the size of a small car. it had red lights blinking out of each side of it, it was yellow, no noise. dropped to almost roof top levels. we were kind of overwelmed.It flew and then dissappeared.
content.summary: Followed a low flying object go over our house, my husband saw it to

content.detailedDescription: My stepdad and i went to the queen mary area of long beach harbor to see if an old b17 bomber shell was still on display but it was only on display for one day either friday or saturday.The display time and location was in the long beach paper. it was gone so we went to shoreline village. we were looking for a parking space and was near the end of the parking lot when a bright object caught my eye at about 4000 ft. my angle of sight put it above the queen mary for reference.The sun was at a position between the object and the goodyear blimp which was at about 800 ft. elevation, the blimp was over the city moving down the beach which was crowded with people and the object was 3 to 4 miles away both were moving the same direction down the beach.When i noticed there were no wings or engines or tail section everything seemed like slow motion i looked at my stepdad and he was busy trying to grab the parking spot and the car in back of us was trying to crowd us past the parking spot so they could park.Anyway it was probably about 500 ft long about 45 ft. high and had no windows and both ends looked the same, sloped and rounded and the whole vessel had rounded edges rather than  sharp 90 degree edges.At what could be called the cockpit section there were seams the whole length spaced evenly like it could be lengthened or shortened.When the car stopped i jumped out  and carefully focused my digital camera and when i pushed the shutter nothing happened. icouldn't believe my luck. the night before i took the full card out got distracted and put the damn full card back in, when i was intent on taking pictures of it a cloud of mist formed like a square wall that you could still see the blue sky through it that was big enough for the craft to slowly fly into but not out of.By the time i had deleted 2 pictures the end of the craft disappeared into the mist.This has really shook me up. no one believes me and if they can do what they did what chance would we have if they meant harm instead of sightseeing. that was my impression after awhile, the speed they were going was slow enough.I can't get this damn thing out of my head and i wish now it didn't happen to me.Do you guys respond to these reports?Hope you guys believe what i have said here i am not able to make this thing up.I can draw it but don't know how to put it into the computer to send to you. sorry for my lack of computer skills.
content.summary: Watched long bright metal object flying same course but higher elevation as goodyear blimp on bright sunny day

content.detailedDescription:
I live in cleburne county, ar. 

my dogs were barking at 11:32 p.M., october 31, 2010...So i went out with a flashlight to see if i could spot what was causing the problem. after looking around i turned the light off. no sooner than i turned the light off, but a bright white light came on in the sky to the north west.  

at first, i thought it was a landing light of an aircraft...Heading to the nearest small airport, but the object was too far out from the airport to have its lights on. so i thought it was a helicopter...There was no sound.

the object was moving slowly from the west to the east and i would guess about 1500 ft in altitude.  there was no sound, what so ever.  as the object passed i could see 9 red flashing lights on the underbelly of the craft...In a trianglar outline. along the sides were three alternating bluish lights. 

i live in a rural area, on the ridge of a mountain. it was a very clear night. no clouds. no city lights. i was facing the north which is cleared...So a clear view.  there are trees to the west of my property and to the east of the property.  the object was in view for approximately three minutes. once it pasted to the east it was out of my line of sight.  i waited for several minutes, but it did not return.

it was really quite exciting and fascinating.  my husband works in the airline industry and i have been around aircraft and blimps at night.  i have never witnessed anything the looks like this.  my first thought was that it is an experimental military aircraft, as we live in the flight path of a airforce base in jacksonville, ar.  but i have never seen this before. 

i called my daughter who lives further east of my location and asked her to step outside and watch for the lights...She never saw them and she lives very near the small airport i mentioned earlier.

i was able to capture three videos with my cellphone camera.  the quality is not great. the first one is the longest, but it is also the one that seems to move around alot, due to my movements...The light was on a steady path.
content.summary: Bright light.. as object passed could see night red blinking lights on underbelly. no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
i have kept this inside of me for 44 years, and i think it's time that i disclose a ufo event, which took place in 1965.
   my brother (who i will refer to as colorado) and i witnessed aliens abducting two young girls, who lived in the trailer next door. we never told a soul about this encounter, and now that he has passed. i am the only person left to recount the events of that fateful night, which changed our lives forever.
   we were living near bossier city louisiana, as our father was deep underground in the air force missile silos, and he worked for days
at a time, in these bunkers. he had just come home on a three day leave, and we were so happy to be able to spend time with him.
colorado and i played rough with our dad all day and we were bushed, come bed time. i slept in the upper bunk, and my brother in the lower.
   suddenly, around 3:00 or 4:00 am we were both awakened by a low thundering sound, and the most brilliantly colored light display,
just outside our window, at the foot of our bunk bed. i moved to the window and looked down to see colorado looking out as well. we both watched
a flying saucer land in the field, close to our neighbor's trailer. our family was very close to these neighbors, and the two young girls living there, were best friends to my brother and myself. i can't recall their names. but, they were approximately seven and ten years old.
  we debated about waking our parents. but were so frightened, and thought if we wake them, and they start turning on outside lights, or walk outside with any weapons. there would be bloodshed, and sheer panic in the trailer park. so, we sat very quietly and simply observed.
   this flying saucer was about 50 feet in diameter, and had multi colored lights around the perimeter. everything beneath the craft was distorted
and wavy, as it was gently settling down in the dirt field. there were four metal legs that slid down from the craft, with round pads on each. all of the lights on the craft went out, within about 30 seconds, after it landed. but, a light blue glow started to envelope the craft, and it made the area around it glow as well. then, a ramp slid down from the craft, and a door opened up, and we could partially see inside the ship. there were dull red and orange lights on the walls, and an electrical crackling sound, emanating from the interior. then the interior lights went out, and the weird sound stopped. suddenly, a figure started to walk down the ramp, and was followed by another.
   now, i think i should mention. colorado and i were never allowed to watch any science fiction shows or movies, with aliens or spaceships. i had never even seen a drawing or picture of a saucer, before this. we were allowed to watch cartoons like scooby doo, and bugs bunny. along with shows like the wonderful world of disney and mutual of omaha's wild kingdom. so, this was truly an adventurous night for us, and definitely something very new.
   the first two beings walking down the ramp, made their way into the light of our neighbors yard. there was a light on the back of their trailer and their porch. when they got closer to the brighter light, on their porch. we could see that they were dressed in the same color of suits. but the weird thing was, that their skin appeared to be the same color as well. they looked human in shape and size. but moved in a way, that made them function more like robots. every movement was very smooth and effortless...As though they were moving about in water. they now remind me of the "blue man group", from vegas. because, they were completely blue all over. then, another two beings exited the craft, and they were green. another two, that were red. until there were six of them in all. they walked in line, up to the door of the trailer. they all passed right through the door, without opening it!...And that scared the heck out of us. more so, than the landing of the craft. we were asking each other... "did you see that? what are they going to do with our friends?"
   minutes later, they passed through the door again, and they were leading the two girls, all the way back to their ship. the girls appeared as though they were sleep walking, and even had their eyes closed. but walked just fine, without any help from these strange beings. now, if you are wondering....Yes, the girls passed right through the door, without it being opened too.
   only about five minutes later, they exited the ship and lead the girls back into the trailer. but, when the beings passed through the door, for the last time...As they were coming out. they all crouched down slightly, turned and looked directly at our window. each one did this in succession, and they smiled....And waved at us! now at this point, my brother and myself were in complete shock, and we could have let a dozen flies in our mouths, as our jaws dropped and we were also completely mesmerized!  i looked at colorado and he looked at me. but, we were unable to say a word.
   they entered the ship, and as the last one went inside, the interior lights came back on. the strange noise started up again, and the door closed. the ramp slid back up inside the craft, and as it slowly lifted off the ground, the four legs retracted up as well. the amazingly colorful lights came back on, around the perimeter of the ship, and it slowly lifted skyward. until it was about 25 feet in the air. then, it shot straight up and out of sight in less than a second.
   the last being standing at the door of the ship, waved at colorado and i, before it closed. i thought i should point that out as well. because, that is the lasting image burned into my memory, every since that strange night. my brother and i talked about that night, possibly thousands of times, before he passed away in 2009. but, we never discussed it with any one else....Ever!
   we tried so hard to see if their was anything different about our neighbor's daughters, after that night. but, we didn't notice anything unusual.
   the louisiana ufo event troubles me to this day. more so, than any other event. i have often wondered, if colorado and i were the actual abductees, and the memory of the girls abduction was planted. but, in any case......... two or possibly even four people were contacted/abducted that night. of that i am sure! i need to find answers to this event some how. even if it means going to a qualified hypnotist, experienced in the abduction phenomena. i have to know exactly what happened in 1965!
   possibly on a hundred different occasions, i considered filing an official report of this incident, with some organization like mufon. i wonder if those two young girls are now going through abduction therapy, as adults. so many unanswered questions, and i think about that night, every single day of my life. i need to get this monkey off of my back, somehow...And this helps to finally tell the world about that strange night.
content.summary: Witnessed a flying saucer land and abduct two young girls.

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of oct.30, 2010 at about 8:15 pm i was in my bed room when i heard my 9 year old son call for me with an urgent tone to his voice. i responded and asked him what he wanted and he stated that there were three orange 'things' in the sky. i immediately ran into the living room and saw that he was scared and crying; my girlfriend and her son were also in the room and were shaken by what they were watching from the living room window.  i instructed my son to go to my bedroom and get my binoculars as i went outside, at first viewing the objects with the naked eye, and then through the binoculars.  what i observed was three circular orange objects traveling single file in a northeastern direction at a speed faster than a commercial aircraft, while making no noise, until they disappeared from view.  there were no flashing red and green wing lights that could be seen to identify it as an aircraft.  my first inclination was to suspect these objects as ufo's. this event was witnessed by all five people in the home that evening: my son, my girlfriend, her son and daughter, and myself during a time span of about five minutes.  (my son related to me that when he first saw the objects they were in a triangular formation and from what i could discern from his description of the event they were moving in a westerly direction and then made a "right-angled" turn split into a single-file formation and proceeded in the northeasterly direction that i had observed.) 

after the event i immediately contacted the local police department through the 911 communication center.  the police responded in a timely manner and took a statement and said that they would check into it.  a while later (about 20 minutes) the police did call back and said that they had contacted the wilkes-barre/scranton international airport and were told that nothing unusual occurred.  i pursued my suspicions that what we witnessed was a ufo event got on my computer and googled "ufo sightings in pa".  there was one link that just jumped right out at me, it read: "new ufo video recorded near keen lake in waymart, pennsylvania 11-oct-2010".  we live right next to keen lake in waymart, pa and the video is exactly what we all witnessed the evening of oct.30, 2010.  there is nothing that can convince any of us differently on what we saw that evening...This was a indeed a ufo sighting.
content.summary: Three orange objects were observed moving in a northeastern direction single file.

content.detailedDescription:
Lol, taking the trash out and looked up and saw this square box with white lights inside, bigger than the moon. i watched it for about two mins and ran into the house for a camera and it was gone!
i was floored by this. heard of this type of incident happening in the east coast......
0322 hours.

*(wit's first name deleted--cms/sg)
content.summary: Square box with tamper angles on top, white lights

content.detailedDescription: At exactly 2020 hours on saturday night between the 5th and 6th innings of the world series, i went on to the porch to smoke, and something in my head said look up at the stars witch i do at night when i am on the porch. i decided to go out to the sidewalk and look at the stars since it was a very clear night. some dark gray movement in the ne part of the sky caught my attention. i looked at it and as it passed over my head i saw that it was moving at a relatively fast pace. i distinctly saw 7 dim orange lights on the leading edges of it. it moved to the sw and disappeared over the houses and i noticed that no sound followed the thing. i have grown up with a father in the air force so i know what aircraft are. i have a great knowledge of modern aircraft and i have never seen anything like this. i keep telling myself that what i saw is not possible. i continued to search the sky as the craft was only 20 miles ne of mcconnell afb. no modern aircraft were trailing the object. about 10 minutes after this incident i saw two flocks of large birds fly over my house and they did not resemble it at all. you could actually make out each individual bird. this craft was almost transparent against the pitch black night sky. it blocked out the stars as it passed by. the dim orange lights were the only thing i could make out clearly. please tell me i am not crazy. my roommates think i am now. i only had about 10 seconds to view it as it again traveled from the ne in a southwesterly direction towards mcconnell afb.
content.summary: Triangle with dim orange lights on leading edges.

content.detailedDescription: Im observed in the sky...An object floatind towards me ......Everynight since this date there r numerous objects movin slowly in the sky and several posted in the sky movin very seldemly around and a couple bright white lighted ones ....... most have blue lights ..I also observed and bright red/orange silver ball shaped spinning in the same spot 4 15 seconds above freeway 470 at 103rd and wornall several days later seeing a silver ball shaped object flyin around like crazy very high speeds....During the day everynight they r out here in the sky ive noticed ever since once dawn hits........2 months later i observed a very large object spaceship with white lights in the middle back top of the object with 1 red light in the back...And never even heard it or made any sounds whatoever around 330 am and took off and dissapeared in a matter of seconds looking north it took off goin northwestit was extremely low at the time i seen it........Every single night since i decided 2 pay more attention 2 the sky tere out here ever since my 1st sight....I see strange very fast blinking white lights traveling very fast speeds across the skies at night and some r just streaks of light and dissapear some r white with red lights most r blue and i observed the same night seeing the very large ship 100 + objects moving around i wasnt on anything and wasnt intoxicated as crazy as all this sounds but its real and very real both my parents admitted 2 seeing ufo's back in the 40's and 70's what im seeing occurs nightly and everynight ever since i seen the conspiracy theory show is how i got your guy's website ...I also called the police the night i started seeing the objects and they patted me down like i was crazy and kept askin me stupid questions like i didnt have all my marbles i take this very serious and know what ive seen and see have a great day
content.summary: Multiple unidentified objects shaped as cylinders most with lights some without

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting the bedroom of my apartment when i heard a helicopter outside. by the time i looked outside my screen door, the helicopter was gone, but off in the distance i could see a bright ball of light hovering. if i put my hand up in front of me, it would be the size of my thumbnail. it was too far for me to see if there was a shape to it, all i saw was a bright ball of white light and it was hovering over the treeline. it could not have been any kind of aircraft we have now, it was too bright to be so far away and it was not a star because it didn't look like a star, it was just small white ball from where i was standing. then it turned blue and then white again, then it dissappeared- just like that. i felt confused at first when i saw it, like i couldn't believe what i was seeing. then i realized this was a real ufo, it could not be anything else but that. a couple of minutes later, i heard helicopters again, so i rush to the screen door and i see three helicopters moving towards the direction of the previous ufo. the bright ball of light, ufo, is there again and the helicopters are moving towards it. and i'm pretty sure that there was also a plane near the ufo, it was quickly flashing red, blue, and white and moved like a plane in one direction. it was coming from the left side. then the ball of light turned blue and dissappeared. and all of the sudden another white ball showed up to the right side, it just showed up out of nowhere. just appeared. i thought it was the same ball of light, but then another one showed up where the previous one was at. so there were two, one in front of me and one to my right. they started moving towards each other, then stopped and dissappeared. the was the last time i saw them last night.
content.summary: Balls of light being followed by us aircrafts

content.detailedDescription:
To whom it may concern,

i had a close sighting of ���something��� but did not know where to report it to until now. a little personal background.  i was in the airborne infantry and am familiar with many military aircraft. i worked six years in law enforcement and have had training in objective observation.  i had previously seen strange lights in the sky from a long way off but the distance made any conclusive identification impossible.  interesting but not enough to persuade me they were not of this world.
 
on march 24th 2007 i saw something in the sky, close up with a lot of visual reference, which i can not explain.  i was returning home around 3:30am after a long night of poker in ashland oregon.  i was heading north bound on hwy 99. as the road heads out of ashland it slopes down for about a mile to the valley floor.   there is a stop light at the end of the slope.  when i was about half way down the hill i noticed a single very bright green light (about ��� mile away). the light seemed to be over jackson hot springs a little past and to the left of the road and traffic light. although it was further away, the light looked much brighter than the closer green traffic light.  at first, i thought that a cell tower had been built that i had never noticed before but the green light did not look like any i had seen on towers.

 as i reached the bottom of the hill i could see three more bright green lights in a straight horizontal line (about a ��� mile away).  the lights were definitely stationary about 90 feet off the ground.  a short distance later i saw a row of four more green above the first.  the way the lights appeared to me, leads me to believe that i was looking at a long cylindrical object. first seeing it head on, as i got closer i had a side view.
  
the lights were directly over jackson hot springs, a natural geothermal spring, less than a hundred yards from the road.  i slowed down to 20mph and put down my window.  the craft was hovering less than hundred yards away from me at about 90feet above the ground. my window was open but i could not hear any noise coming from it.  if it were a helicopters at that distance, the roader noise would be very loud and the down wash would have made all the trees in the area violently sway.  

the green lights were circular and about 2.5 feet in diameter.  the light they produced was vivid green but did not illuminate any of the surrounding craft. despite being so near, i could not see any outline of the structure containing the lights.  it was very dark but i could see the trees in front of the lights and make out the darker hills jutting steeply up 200 yards away.   the green lights were spaced out about 15 feet apart with the second row about 10 feet directly over the first.

as i passed the ���rear end��� of the craft i could see a very bright pure white oblong light.  the white light was about 8 feet long and 5 feet high. this light also did not illuminate any of the craft or the area around it. although i could not see any of the craft, the way the white light presented lead me to believe that it was a flat ���end��� of a cylindrical craft.  the ���end��� of the craft was about 15 feet behind the last green light.   the distance between the first green light to the white light was about 75 feet.

the lights became obscured behind a row of trees on the side of the road.  i turned the car around so i could get a good view of the lights again. the lights were out of my view for about 10 seconds.  when i could see the craft again it was headed over the hills about a mile and a half away.  at that point, i could only see the end white light. it was moving at a high rate of speed and following the contours of the hill.
 
 i had a very good look at some sort of craft and it definitely did not seem to me manmade.  i can���t explain it. is this a discription you have heard of before?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Close sighting (within 100 yard) of unknown hovering object

content.detailedDescription: I pulled into my driveway at exactly 7pm and went to the back of the car to take out groceries.  i've seen (and previously video taped) a sighting so i am now inclined to always look up.  from the back of my car i saw a low flying orange ball or orb that was moving very fast over my culdesac.  it made no noise and moved in a very smooth line from south to north.  after it was over my home it either disappeard into night clouds or vanished all together.  i tried to record on my cell phone, but it wouldn't pick anything up.  there were planes flying well over the orange ball, so it was clear to me that this wasn't a plane. someone also reported seeing the same thing in bellview illinois a couple of hours later (on another site).  very weird.
content.summary: Orange orb flying low over carol stream illinois

content.detailedDescription: It was about 1:00am on a clear skied night. i was living in town, but my street is dark with only a few light poles, so i could see the night stars fairly brightly. as i drove north on my street, something caught my eye in front of me. i could tell it was an dark object moving towards me, but at first i couldn't make out a shape. as it came closer, moving very slow around 15mph, i could make out a trianglular shape. this thing was very large. i stopped my car at the stopsign and opened my door and got out and looked up as it passed overhead. it was very silent, but it did have a very light "purring" sound. i watched it flow over head and was just in awe. i knew immediatly what i was seeing and just couldn't take my eyes off it as it continued down my street and over a small city pond and off in the distance. my husband was with me, but unfortunatly, doesn't remember anything (him and his buddies pulled a good beer buzz and he was passed out in the passenger seat). i did try to wake him up when it was overhead, but he was loudly suggesting me to get in the car and take him home. i think that if he were not with me, and i was by myself that night, i would have turned around and followed that thing. what was really odd is that this object ,when overhead, blocked out all the stars and was not conspicuous at all. if not looking up at the time, i would have never even knew it was there. i think i was just at the right place at the right time that night. i have always believed in ufo's since i was a little girl and continue to have a great interest in the truth. i've told my stories a couple to time to different people when the subject comes up, but i don't really think they believe me. i don't talk about this incident anymore. my husband didn't remember anything the next morning and still doesn't to this day. i don't know if he believes me either, but i know what i saw that night. it was, without a doubt, not from our doing here in this world. i would also like to note that cannon air force base is home here in clovis, new mexico and i've seen many weird looking military airplanes but nothing like this.
content.summary: Watched large triangle shape object ,that blocked out stars when above me, heading up street north. very faint "purring" sound, dim lights

content.detailedDescription:
I realized that i was running out of time to enjoy night walks around my college campus before the weather got cold, so i decided to take a quick stroll around campus.  unfortunately, i was alone and have no witnesses that can back up my story.  i left my apartment around 11:00pm, and eventually arrived near the school library at approximately 11:25pm.  there, i decided to take a break and relax on one of the benches while enjoying the cool night air and looking at the stars.

i was facing north-northeast while sitting on the bench.  despite being near the city, there were some stars visible.  there were no clouds that night, and the temperature was perhaps in the high 50s (fahrenheit).

i had been sitting on the bench for only a minute when movement in the sky at about my 9 o'clock position caught my attention.  the time was shortly before 11:30pm.  i looked up and to my left, expecting to see a flock of birds.  what i saw was three small white objects in a triangular formation heading due north, the point of the triangle leading.  birds and bats roost at the top of the library, and it was quite common to see them flying around the library area at night.  originally this is what i thought i was seeing, but there were two problems with that.  first, i noticed that the white objects were round orbs instead of bird-shaped or bat-shaped, and these things did not seem to be flapping any wings.  second, never once did these things break their triangular formation or change direction the way birds in flight would.

that was when i realized that i was not looking at birds or bats illuminated by the glow from the library, but dim white lights.  at the same moment, i realized that there was a mass behind the lights that was slightly darker than the rest of the sky.  i was not looking at three separate objects, but three lights positioned at the tips of a larger triangular object.  the lights were slightly fainter than most of the stars that night, and did not pulse or change color.  the craft was approximately the size of an airliner, and i believe it was flying around 5,000 feet.  i cannot guess the speed of the craft, but it was moving fast enough to be out of sight in a few seconds; so, much faster than any airplane or helicopter.  as i watched, i was puzzled by what i was observing.  it definitely was not a flock of birds or bats, there were no aeronautical lights that would indicate it to be a normal aircraft, there was absolutely no sound, and the lights were moving much too fast for them to be satellites passing overhead.  that was when i realized that i was observing a literal unidentified flying object.  a few seconds later, the craft and its lights disappeared into the night and the glow of the city.  at no point did the craft alter its speed or heading, make any sound, or change its appearance in any way.  the entire encounter must have lasted a mere five seconds.

as i watched the craft move, i was struck by four things:  
1)  i had absolutely no reasonable explanation for what i was witnessing.  i have seen countless helicopters and airplanes fly over the campus at night in the years that i have been attending school, so i know exactly what airplanes, helicopters, satellites, shooting stars, and birds or bats look like at night.  this object was obviously not any of those things.
2)  i was struck by how vividly i was witnessing something that defied explanation.  yes, the lights and the triangular craft were dim, but there is no doubt in your mind when you see the dim moon during the day either.  similarly, i was completely sure of what i was seeing, and that it was real.  there was no question in my interpretation, which was the next thing that struck me.
3)  the only explanation i had for this clear evidence was a ufo.
4)  the final thing that surprised me was when i started thinking back on what i had just seen.  despite the speed, large size, and close proximity of the object, it was perfectly silent and drew almost no attention to itself.  had i not been looking in the right place at the right time, i would have missed it completely without even knowing there was anything around to miss.  this thing was amazingly inconspicuous.

i don���t know what this object was, but i know what it wasn���t.  it definitely was not any sort of helicopter or airplane like i���ve ever seen, bird or bat, balloon, natural phenomenon, or trick of the eye.  simply put, i have no reasonable idea what this thing was.
content.summary: A black triangular craft with dim white lights at each corner silently flew low and fast over eastern tulsa, heading due north.

content.detailedDescription:
While video taping fireworks on my hd camera  i saw reoccurring red dots that seemed to be flying  in formation, not fading out like fireworks. i'm certain they are not fireworks! there must have been 50 plus red and white dots moving west to north east that kept coming and coming. 

i was reminded by this event when i saw the tribune on sat. that mentioned the tpark sightings. my wife and i had a baby in march so with being so occupied i forgot to report anything. i am willing to show you the video- i like in frankfort. 
unless the airport has record of a flying club flying 50+ small silent planes, this has got to be ufo's. it's also worth noting that there was no sound at all. 
this is no hoax, give me a call.  i have hi 8 hd video and i don't know how to upload it.   

call me on my cell. *(wit's telephone number deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: I have hd video of some thing very similar to the 2094 tinley park il video

content.detailedDescription:
I was video tapping the moon oct24,2010 around 1:20 am.
just moved camera in this area.Bang it flew into my view.
the first one was about 12mins into tap.
yes-i have my tape to prove it.
content.summary: Ufo makse a very sharp left turn almost a u turn

content.detailedDescription: The star like shaped object appeared and then hovered in place for a minute or two over cape cod bay at paine's creek beach, then dropped straight down in a line and hovered in place for about another minute or two.  the object got brighter.  then moved straight up and hovered awhile and then moved very fast to the southeast and finally disappeared.  the object made no noise and was not an airplane and or a helicopter.  myself and two freinds viewed it and other three people saw it and we all were saying wow, how strange, it's definitely a ufo.  everyone agreed and was awestruck.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Star like object over cape cod bay

content.detailedDescription: I was outside of my workplace and noticed a bright light in the sky with a co-worker. it looked very different to me so i grabbed my binoculars out of my car to look at it closer. this "object" was shaped as a cigar, all lit up like a light bulb in color. there were no blinking lights like an airplane has. i stared at this for 10 minutes trying to figure out what it is. it slowly moved across the sky, heading north-east. all of a sudden it stopped for about 3 minutes at a stand still. with my binoculars glues to my eyes, i stood in one spot staring at this weird thing not moving in the sky. all of a sudden, it took off, with an enormous amount of speed, into the clear dark sky. i stood there waiting for it to come back but it never did.
content.summary: All lit up like a light bulb, slow pace, no blinking lights like a plane, no sound, going north-east then disappeared very fast.

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out towards the hudson river/west side of manhattan from the cliff in cliffside park, nj. saw a crisp controlled white light come out the sky so fast it made the planes and helicopters appear to be not moving. i would venture to say it was going at thousands of mph. 

it came down over 95th st area over nyc skyline. then the light turned off. 2 minutes later there was a flash/burst of light in the exact area in the sky where the object was last seen before the lights went off. 

there were no clouds in that area. there was no lightning that night although it did rain earlier that evening. but, the skies were very clear when this event occured. my location provides me a panoramic view of the nyc skyline at 1.5 mile away and 150 feet above sea level.
content.summary: Fast white traveling light over nyc

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way home from school. i was driving home on the us54/patriot freeway going south. first thing i noticed was that there were 2 lights in the sky. i noticed this very quickly because i like to look at the sky at all times to see whats up there. on this freeway you can pretty much see all the way to mexico. it was dusk but still a blue sky. first thing i thought was that it was a planet, but there were no stars out yet so you couldn't really see a planet that brightly. second thing i thought was its a plane or helicopter, but they weren't moving. so i kept driving home while looking at these lights. about ten minutes later i stop on a road on the way home because i need to take a picture. while i'm stopping i noticed that a plane was flying by the lights. at this time the sun was setting over the mountain so it was sort of dark but they were still there. as i looked down to get my camera and to take the picture they were gone. the plane continued on and the stars began to be visible but the bright lights weren't there anymore. if they were planets they would still be visible. planes and helicopters strobe lights would be able to be seen. i work at the airport so i see these all the time even when they are at 30k feet. 

the thing that makes me wonder is maybe they were still there but we cant see them in the dark. maybe the sun reflects off of them, but in the dark they are invisible. 

today the 30th i asked around at work and my friend told me his wife saw the lights. she told him that she saw 3 of them and that they were there for about 15 minutes and they were diamond shaped. 

the picture i attached is just an example. keep in mind the time of day is not the same and it is from google maps. it just to show the positioning in the sky. 

i also saw the lights that were skydivers a couple weeks ago. i knew they were skydivers as they left the plane. you could see them from where i was perfectly and the plane was around them on both jumps. 

i also saw another ufo type object on the 13th at 3am on the way to work. nothing major just a light in the sky that took off into space. was not a meteor, or comet, or shooting star. it took off at light speed. just fyi so you know that i am looking up all the time.
content.summary: Lights in sky , then gone

content.detailedDescription: Looking into the southern sky i witnessed several red circles trailing fire in the southern sky.  they became brighter and continued to travel south out of sight.  what apperaed to be a military jet fighter was beneath them flying north.  we were sitting at work  and saw out  the window.  i am not sure what they were, i have never seen anything like this before.  i felt confused and amazed by this encounter, and may have changed my skeptism about ufo sightings
content.summary: Several discs trailing fire,  got brighter and progressed south out of sight, also saw military plane in location

content.detailedDescription: See the attached picture we found on another web site that is an identical match to what we saw traveling from n to s on 10/24 & 10/28. it was completely silent and on the fist night turned and disappeared before it went out of sight. if these are military uav's then we have the ability to fly silent and disappear.
content.summary: Picture that exactly matches v shaped object we saw on 10/24 & 10/28

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were outside putting some things in my work truck when she said to me " what the heck is that ". i turned to face her and ask what was what. she pointed up to the sky toward the north and said "that". at first i looked toward where she was pointing and didn't see anything then i seen it. she asked me if it was a flock of geese at first and as it got closer you could clearly tell it wasn't birds.  as the object flew overhead you cold clearly tell there was mass to it. the moon was shining behind it just to the left of the object. as it flew overhead it made absolutely "no" sound ! there were no lights emitting from it and it appeared to be transparent. the only thing you could actually see was the outline of the object. it was enormous in size. the object flew from a north to south direction and as it passed us it was as if it completely disappeard. my wife and i stood looking into the sky and couldn't see anything but stars. i ran around the corner of my house to see if i could see anything and there was nothing !! i looked at her and said i got to draw a picture really quick of what i just witnessed. i got in the truck and found some scratch paper and drew a real quick pictuer and asked my wife if this is what she saw . after showing her the picture we just stood there starring into the sky for a few more minutes amazed. we both were so excited..I wanted to tell someone but didn't know who to tell. my wife looked at me and said " i'm glad we got to share this experience together. she has told me over the years that as a little girl she had witnessed an object durring the daylight hours. i was always kind of skeptical of people saying they saw strange unidentified flying objects in the sky until now. i now know beyond a shadow of a doubt there truely are mysteries above !!
content.summary: Object flew silently over head

content.detailedDescription: I just want to testify that i had witness a similar object in the sky, as reported from texas and arizona. i'm in southwest minnesota. it occurred around 9:30 pm, on october 27th. i had seen solid white sphere about an half hour before this sighting and submitted a report, the same night. (but is no longer up on the mufon map) anyway, i decided to step out side to scan the skies again. and to my surprise, seen the blinking star in the southern sky. it would blink for 15 t0 20 seconds and then the sky would go black in that spot. it appeared to move slightly to the left or the right of its position. while viewing the "flashing star", i wondered if this had any connection to the solid white sphere that i had seen earlier. was thrilled to seem so much activity in one night.
content.summary: Blinking  star-like

content.detailedDescription: About a week ago i reported a similar event. this time the star like object came from due north of my house and headed southeast. again it looked like a star and even crossed over a couple of stars, but was definitly below them in altitude. it did not flash like an aircraft and was moving at too slow of a speed to be a meteor. it did disappear near saggitarius again. my wife saw it as well, but neither of us know what it was. the object did not travel a straight line the entire time we saw it. it did move in a slight zig-zag motion shortly before it disappeared.
content.summary: Another star like object over washington, ia

content.detailedDescription:
Let me first say regarding the time of this event, i had not been drinking and was most definitely not drunk, high, or anything of the sort. i had taken a break from writing a paper for my mba class and had just returned from watching a movie. it was just before 1am local time, 12:57am to be exact, and i went outside to have a smoke and star gaze since it was a nice, clear night. even with the light pollution from phoenix you can still see quite a bit out in the nw valley around the arrowhead mall area. facing s/se i saw a flash. at the exact same time i saw a shooting star so at first i dismissed it. still looking in that general direction but not the exact same part of the sky i caught it again out of the corner of my eye. for a few minutes i watched as the light would blink on then go dark. i counted the interval to myself and then confirmed it with the stopwatch on my cell phone. the light would consistently blink on, go dark, then blink back on again every 10 seconds. i was fascinated because it also appeared not to be moving. at this time of night orion had just risen over our neighbor's roof in the se section of the sky. i first observed the light slightly farther to the south and about halfway between the star rigel of orion and the constellation taurus relative to the horizon. after watching it for a few more minutes i ran inside to grab my binoculars. i looked at the clock and it was now 1:07am so i'd been watching it slowly move and blink on and off for roughly 10 minutes at this point. when i came back outside, in what had to be less than a minute, i had a hard time locating it because during that time it moved a much larger distance than what i had been witnessing. it moved some relatively large distances a few times while i continued watching it but nothing like when i went inside. looking at it through the binoculars you could see no shape and the light always appeared white/bluish-white, however, with the naked eye occasionally the light seemed to be an amber or orange-ish color.

at this point it has moved almost into orion. the light didn't appear to get higher or lower in the horizon, it always seemed to maintain the same angle in the horizon relative to the neighbor's roof line. i attribute this to the earth's rotation, the stars were moving separately from the light and the light appeared to be traversing the sky in a straight line. i make this assumption because when i first saw the light it was higher in the horizon than orion and when it disappeared a half hour later it was below orion. so it actually passed through orion above the belt stars and ended up just north of e below the star betelgeuse, the orange colored star in orion's shoulder, on a path to intersect the moon's trajectory when i lost sight of it.

due to its odd on/off pattern and the lack of red and green marking lights along with its slow movement i am certain that this was not an airplane. also, i've seen plenty of satellites and it seemed to move far too slow to be that as well. when you add the fact that you could see no shape through the binoculars it must either be small, black, or very far away. the thing is i don't think it was far away, whether that be orbiting or deeper in space, based on its straight line movement. i think it was actually in our atmosphere just very high up there. the small distance it moved during the half hour i observed it seemed odd to me too...It did seem to me that it was in the atmosphere which would mean it should be subjected to gravity and fall for how slow it moved, it only covered about a 45 degree sweep of the sky during the entire 33 minutes that i observed it!

i'm not sure if it actually vanished or if i lost sight of it due to light pollution or its proximity to the moon. right before i lost sight of it i texted my brother who is camping up near prescott and far from big city light pollution to find out if he could see it up there as well but never heard back from him. i'm at a complete loss. i have no idea what that light could have been??? this is the 2nd strange thing i've seen in the sky out here in the desert in the last month and a half. if anybody else saw it or has any idea what it might have been i would like to know for sure!
content.summary: Watched light traversing slowly from se to ene blinking on every 10 seconds until it disappeared after about a half hour.

content.detailedDescription: Ok, this is now the 2nd time i've seen something like this in the past 2 weeks and its always late late in am like 2-4am. thers a blinking object way way high up in the sky. i see no outline of this thing. its just a light that blinks about every 15 seconds or so and it dosen't move. i watched this flash in the same part of the sky to the right of the moon here theres 2 pretty bright starts directly to the right of those stars this thing flashed for a good 30 minutes before it was gone. it was in the same exact part of the sky. i don't go out that often this time of night but i've managed to see this twice now in 2 weeks. not a satellite not a plane. unless its the really really slow kind.
content.summary: Blinking star like

content.detailedDescription:
I was camping with a group of friends in washington, missouri.  it was late, and we were sitting out watching the stars.  then we saw a meteor.  then another.  in the space of about about 10 minutes, there were 20 meteors.  about a minute after the meteors stopped, something else, which i thought was a meteor at first, appeared.  it  was reddish and very slightly brighter than the stars around it.  it stayed there for about 1 minute.  it then moved what would be roughly six inches if held at arm's length to the northwest over a course of about 2 seconds, and just stayed there for another 2 minutes or so, then faded and disappeared.

~mad vulcan
content.summary: A light that appeared in the sky, moved, then stayed there.
